title: AI4EOSC: a Federated Cloud Platform for Artificial Intelligence in Scientific Research
summary: In this paper, we describe a federated compute platform dedicated to support Artificial Intelligence in scientific workloads. Putting the effort into reproducible deployments, it delivers consistent, transparent access to a federation of physically distributed e-Infrastructures.
